trans-unit.source: Represents a single item of data extracted from a workflow and all its associated annotations.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record to the tracking service.

An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> may contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects that specify data to be extracted from the workflow and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.

A TrackingDataItem represents a single item of this extracted data in either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref> class.
Gets and sets the list of annotations associated with the extracted data.

An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> can specify annotations to be sent with the extracted data.
These are contained in the Annotations property.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations associated with the extracted data.
Gets or sets the extracted data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref>.

Data contains the member data, specified by an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, that was extracted from the workflow instance.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the extracted data.
Gets or sets the name of the property or field associated with the extracted data.

The runtime tracking infrastructure supports data extraction on fields and properties of classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>; a member of such a field or property; and a single item of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, for example a single element in a collection.

FieldName contains the dot delineated name of the item extracted and is equivalent to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> depending on which type of extract specified the data contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.
The dot delineated name of the property or field that was extracted.
